name: tm22
effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches SolarBeam to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Absorbs sunlight in the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A 2-turn move that blasts the foe with absorbed energy in the 2nd turn.
